external_games.name: Yay! Spring Trip with My Coworkers!

name: Yay! Spring Trip with My Coworkers!
storyline:
"I've been working at the famous Y/N Bar & Restaurant for a year... but I haven't gotten to know my coworkers at all!
I can't miss the chance this few days staff spring trip brings! I know I might be anxious and awkward... but can I finally break the professional wall and be more than just a 'coworker'?"
summary: Yay! Spring Trip with My Coworkers! is a Visual Novel created for Blossom VN Jam 2024 and Fuck Capitalism Jam 2024 as it's about a trip full of fun spring activities and complaining about your job.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Yay! Spring Trip With My Coworkers! - Visual Novel Trailer
